Claim: "Two men stand on a golf course."
Implication: "Therefore, two men are standing on a golf course."
Referring expressions: Two men, golf course  Two men, golf course
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsOnGolfCourse(a) and IsOnGolfCourse(b))) & (forall c ( IsStandingOnGolfCourse(c) ->  IsOnGolfCourse(c)))) -> (exists a (exists b (IsTwoMen(a,b))))
